categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Minax was a female Sith Pureblood Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the the Cold War, and the Galactic War, who resided on Balmorra. The theft of the Barrager design notes alerted her to the Republic interest in the Barrager, and she threatened to kill Dr. Carsiri for his involvement. She was killed by Republic and Jedi forces shortly thereafter.
